hangle: 수색 인원은 정말 이 정도로 괜찮겠습니까?
first_translate: is this really  enough people for our search party?
for now, yes.

hangle: 수색도 수색이지만, 용이 두 마리나 있어요.
first_translate: I know we need more men to find lord abel,

hangle: 병력을 많이 끌고 간다면 주의를 끌게 될지 몰라요.
first_translate: but if too many soldiers come along, they might attract unwanted attention from those dragons.

hangle: 제가 도착하기 앞서 아벨을 찾던 헤일론의 병력들도 많이 지쳐있으니
first_translate: the hylon troops were already exhausted before I arrived...
and we can’t afford any casualties.
okay... my lady.

hangle: 두 분 모두 부디 무사히 돌아오셔야 합니다.
first_translate: be careful out there, both of you.

hangle: 걱정 마세요. 필요하다면 즉시 마법으로 신호할게요.
first_translate: don’t worry.  I’ll send a signal using magic right away if anything happens.
it’s not something that I want to think about,
but realistically speaking,

hangle: 아벨의 시신을 찾게 될 가능성이 더 높다.
first_translate: even if luck is on our side, chances are higher that we'll only end up finding his body.
that must’ve been why jeron asked me...

hangle: 아벨을 찾아달라는 부탁이 아니라 무사히 돌아오라는 것이겠지.
first_translate: ...not to bring back abel but to return safely myself.
as long as one of us survives...
I’d like to believe he's still alive,

hangle: 병사들에게는 북부 산맥의 하늘을 눈여겨보라고 전해 주세요.
first_translate: but tell the soldiers to keep their eyes open while searching through the northern mountains.

hangle: 이성은 이미 냉정한 답을 내리고 있다.
first_translate: my rational self has already given up hope.
this feels so strange after such a long time...

hangle: 내가 헤일론에 도착하기 전에도 여러 수색대를 보낸 덕에
first_translate: before I even got here, several teams had gone looking for him,
so at least we have narrowed down where to look.

hangle: 남은 게 제일 위험한 곳이란 게 문제지만.
first_translate: the problem is what remains is the most dangerous part.
if we do happen to find abel around these parts,

hangle: 보통의 사람들이라면 함께 돌아올 수 없는 곳 말이다.
first_translate: then it would mean he was somewhere ordinary humans wouldn’t dare venture into.
maybe that’s why jeron called upon me...
...even though he thought all hope was lost.
do you hear that...?
it sounds like a dragon crying.

hangle: 그래, 고통에 가득 차있는 것 같은데.
first_translate: right! its cry seems full of pain.
siegren,

hangle: 나와 함께 가 줄 수 있어?
first_translate: can you follow me?
to wherever the dragons may be.
y-your grace, that’s far too risky!
we could run into them face-to-face--
alright then.
you’re not going to ask why I’m doing this despite how dangerous it is?

hangle: 네가 아까부터 뭔가 마음에 걸린다는 표정이었으니까.
first_translate: well, your expression told me you've been worried sick since earlier.
when we get there,

hangle: 네가 왜 그랬는지 알 수 있겠지.
first_translate: I'm sure I will understand why.
fiona, over here.
there are signs of fire being lit recently.

hangle: 그렇네. 정말 아벨 일행이 여기까지 왔나 봐.
first_translate: indeed. looks like abel did make it this far.
siegren.

hangle: 아주 먼 옛날에는 용들이 인간과 교류했던 시절이 있었어.
first_translate: a very long time ago, dragons used to interact with humans.
one particular dragon...

hangle: 세상의 모든 지혜를 가졌다고 칭송받기도 했지.
first_translate: ...was praised for possessing wisdom beyond compare.
where did you learn that story?

hangle: 넌 그런 걸 어떻게 알고 있어?
first_translate: how do you know things like that?
oops, world history...
no one remembers anymore because it happened during a forgotten era...
wait, fiona.
look, there’s blood inside the cave.
the bloodstains haven’t frozen yet,
which tells us whatever made them wasn’t too long ago.
the wind blows toward this direction.
judging by the monsters gathered nearby,
abel and his group definitely passed through here.
but...

hangle: 마물이라면 아벨이 있는 곳에 몰려 있을 줄 알았는데,
first_translate: I expected the monsters to swarm near abel,
not just wander aimlessly around this area.

hangle: 차라리 아벨이 이미 이곳을 떠난 거라면 좋겠지만…
first_translate: let’s pray abel left this place behind already...
or else...
fiona.
siegren, are you alright? are you hurt anywhere?

hangle: 멀쩡해, 저쪽에 있던 마물은 다 해치웠어.
first_translate: I’m fine. I took care of all the monsters over there.

hangle: 그보다, 저쪽에 마물이 잔뜩 몰려있던 곳이 있었는데.
first_translate: anyway, I found a spot swarming with monsters.
I waited a bit just in case--
fiona!!!
sh*t, wait!
that way leads straight to the edge of the cliff--!
abel,
stop!!! please stop, fiona!!
abel...!!!
abel...?
